values: Supernatural Pastors: How to Minister in God’s StrengthSupernatural Pastors: How to Minister in God’s Strength

Brothers, if we are going to do good — lasting good — to our churches, then we must preach and lead and counsel and serve in the strength that God supplies.Brothers, if we are going to do good — lasting good — to our churches, then we must preach and lead and counsel and serve in the strength that God supplies.
